TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IGridProvider

summary.span: 公开一些方法和属性，UI 自动化客户端可通过这些方法和属性访问充当某个子元素集合的容器的控件。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that act as containers for a collection of child elements.

summary.span: 此元素的子级必须实现 ，而且必须使用键盘在可以进行遍历的一个二维逻辑坐标系统中组织（即，UI 自动化客户端可以移动到相邻控件）。

span.span: The children of this element must implement and be organized in a two-dimensional logical coordinate system that can be traversed (that is, a UI Automation client can move to adjacent controls) by using the keyboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须支持的 UI 自动化提供程序上实现控件模式。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern. 不会启用网格的主动操作；必须实现 以启用此功能。 does not enable active manipulation of a grid; must be implemented to enable this functionality.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnCount As Integer
public: property int ColumnCount { int get(); };

span.span: Gets the total number of columns in a grid.
The total number of columns in a grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隐藏的行和列，具体取决于提供程序实现中，可以在加载[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]树，因此将反映在和属性。Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, can be loaded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree and will therefore be reflected in the and properties. 如果隐藏的行和列尚未加载它们将不计。If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they will not be counted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例返回属性值。The following example code returns the property value. [!code-csharp[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/CSharp/CustomGrid.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/visualbasic/customgrid.vb#102)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple GetItem(int32 row, int32 column) cil managed
Public Function GetItem (row As Integer, column As Integer) As IRawElementProviderSimple

span.span: The ordinal number of the row of interest.
The ordinal number of the column of interest.

summary.span: 检索指定单元格的 UI 自动化提供程序。

span.span: Retrieves the UI Automation provider for the specified cell.

returns.span: 指定单元格的 UI 自动化提供程序。

span.span: The UI Automation provider for the specified cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 网格坐标都从零开始的坐标为 (0，0) 的左上角 （或右上角单元格，具体取决于区域设置）。Grid coordinates are zero-based with the upper left (or upper right cell depending on locale) having coordinates (0,0). - 如果单元格为空的 UI 自动化提供程序必须仍返回为了支持该单元格的属性。If a cell is empty a UI Automation provider must still be returned in order to support the property for that cell. 这可在网格中的子元素的布局是类似于未对齐的数组。This is possible when the layout of child elements in the grid is similar to a ragged array. ![Windows 资源管理器视图显示未对齐的布局。] (~/add/media/uia-gridpattern-ragged-array.PNG "Windows 资源管理器视图显示未对齐的布局。")![Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.](~/add/media/uia-gridpattern-ragged-array.PNG "Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.") 坐标为空的 Grid 控件的示例Example of a Grid Control with Empty Coordinates - 隐藏的行和列，具体取决于提供程序实现中，可以在加载[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]树，因此将反映在和属性。Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, can be loaded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree and will therefore be reflected in the and properties. 如果隐藏的行和列尚未加载它们不应进行计数。If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they should not be counted. ## Examples 以下代码是实现此方法返回一个表示位于指定位置处的项的对象的示例。The following code is an example implementation of this method that returns an object representing the item at the specified location. [!code-csharp[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/CSharp/CustomGrid.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/visualbasic/customgrid.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RowCount As Integer
public: property int RowCount { int get(); };

span.span: Gets the total number of rows in a grid.
The total number of rows in a grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隐藏的行和列，具体取决于提供程序实现中，可以加载逻辑树中，因此将反映在和属性。Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, can be loaded in the logical tree and will therefore be reflected in the and properties. 如果隐藏的行和列尚未加载它们将不计。If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they will not be counted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例返回属性值。The following example code returns the property value. [!code-csharp[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/CSharp/CustomGrid.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/visualbasic/customgrid.vb#103)]
